Package restaurant

Class TableManager

java.lang.Object
restaurant.TableManager
public class TableManager extends Object
Manages table and reservation in the restaurant.

    • getAvailableTables

      public ArrayList<Integer> getAvailableTables​(LocalDateTime time, int pax)
      Returns a list of id of available tables at given time with capacity equal or larger than pax. This method automatically calls update() to clear expired reservations.
      Parameters:
      time - Query time.
      pax - Number of person at table.
      Returns:
      An array of id of available tables, sort in order from the small (but still larger than pax) to large.

    • getAvailableTables

      public boolean[] getAvailableTables​(LocalDateTime time)
      Query available tables in given time.
      Parameters:
      time - The inquired time.
      Returns:
      Boolean array indicating available tables with true.

    • update

      public void update()
      Removes expired reservations.

      public void printAllTables()
      Prints table information to standard output in a user-friendly way.

      public void printAllTables​(LocalDateTime time)
      Prints table information according to the given time period.
      Parameters:
      time - the time period for table availability
